attributes.action: Increase the mororway speed limit to 100MPH/160KMH after a over due review.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the increased safety of todays vehicles we should look at increasing the Motorway speed limit to 100 mph in line with the autobahns of Germany. As you are all aware the general flow of traffic on Britains main motorways are seldom travelling below 85 and 95 mph.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Increase the mororway speed limit to 100MPH/160KMH after a over due review."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22236


Prime Minister's Office
